content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Margaret! Could you please provide your full address so we can check service availability?
It's 123 Maple, but I'm not sure if it's okay to share my address here.
I understand your concern, Margaret. Unfortunately, I need your address to proceed with scheduling your HVAC service. Could you please provide it so I can assist you properly?
I really don't want to share my address right now. Sorry.
I'm unable to proceed without the address. I will now escalate this issue to our human team for further assistance.
reason: Customer refuses to provide address required for service area validation
